With each update we do shopping with Joom even easier and more profitable! We value your opinion about our goods and our delivery. Leave feedback and share your opinion with us in our app.

Introducing a new shopping cart and checkout look for Apple Pay users. We reduced the number of screens prior to payment, so now paying has become even easier. We've also added a new promotion, "Buy together", which allows you to purchase a product at a discounted price if you buy it at the same time as another customer!

Introducing a new shopping cart and checkout look for Apple Pay users. We reduced the number of screens prior to payment, so now paying has become even easier. We've also added a new promotion, "Buy together", which allows you to purchase a product at a discounted price if you buy it at the same time as another customer!

New in this release — convenient filters in the notification center. Order notifications will no longer be lost among the hundreds of likes to your social posts!
Also now we hide the goods "for adults" until you confirm you are of age 18 or over.
Enjoy your shopping!

What's new with this version:
- Now you can see similar products and this product in other sellers' stores on the product page;
- Now the product page states if the phone was "refurbished";
- Fixed some minor bugs from previous versions.
Shop with convenience and stay safe!

We've updated our app. Here's what's new:
- Recognition of your phone's model when buying screen protectors and cases. Now you won't have to look for it on the product page;
- An ad with popular bloggers in our social network, so that it's even more convenient for you to subscribe to them and read the latest updates;
- The ability to make purchases, even if your card has recently expired, and you haven't managed to issue a new one yet;
- And a few more minor improvements.

Enjoy your shopping! :) Take care.

The new version of the app is faster and more stable than the previous one, but that's not all. From 24 to 27 September in Joom a big seasonal sale. Don't miss discounts and surprises!
If you still did not have time for the sale, do not be upset. First, we always have low prices, and new shares appear every week. And secondly, stay tuned. In October, we will definitely arrange something interesting for you!

The new version of the app is better than the old one for sure, but the news doesn't end here. We at Joom are having a sale from 8th to 11th of October: we plan to drop the prices for all the popular and necessary things. And we've prepared a whole lot of daily and weekly deals for different products categories.

Here's some more news about this update. Sadly, after the 2.45 version release, we won't support iOS10 anymore. We're trying not to get emotional, but it's time to move on.

The holidays are over, but not on Joom! Here's a few more great reasons to go on a shopping spree in near future:
• January 30th to January 31st – the last January sale! Presents and deals for different products from different categories are waiting for you.
• February 8th to February 23rd – a festival of all-over-the-world shopping. Sellers from Korea, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, Europe and other regions are taking part. And the Chinese New Year celebrations – we're preparing a all-prize lottery, prizes and presents. Stop by more often!
• February 24th to 28th – a grand sale. There will be not only deals for best-selling hits, but for new season's new arrivals too!

Why don't we continue celebrating New Year into February too? Yeah, we also don't have a single reason not to do that, especially since the Chinese New Year is celebrated on February 12th this year.
This is the most important and continuous holiday in China. Chinese New Year is usually a family holiday, so many employees from big corporations take a vacation and do not return to work until the end of February. During this period, the delivery timeframes for some Chinese products will be extended. Everything will get back to normal soon, and meanwhile, see what we've prepared for you:
• We'll tell you more about the Chinese New Year - you can also take a quiz to participate in a win-win lottery with guaranteed prizes.
• From February 8th to 23rd, you're invited to our Worldwide Fest. Sellers from Korea, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, Europe and other regions are taking part. It's a great way to have a shopping trip while the borders are still closed!
• We're waiting for you at our grand sale from February 24th to 28th. There will be not only deals for best-sellers, but next season's new arrivals too!

Spring is here! We're heading into the new season with a fresh new version of the app. Thanks to our latest fixes and optimizations, shopping with Joom will give you an even brighter and sunnier experience!

Meanwhile, from March 11 to the 14th, we'll be having a sale featuring goods from many different countries and categories. There's no such thing as too many discounts and bonuses, so we've prepared a big bundle of coupons for all users.

Happy shopping!
